parameterName.title: parametr name
parameterName.description: name of the parameter - P|U|k|omega|epsilon and etc.

cacheAgglomeration.title: cacheAgglomeration
cacheAgglomeration.description: switch specifying caching of the agglomeration strategy

nCellsInCoarsestLevel.title: nCellsInCoarsestLevel
nCellsInCoarsestLevel.description: approximate mesh size at the most coarse level in terms of the number of cells

directSolveCoarset.title: directSolveCoarset
directSolveCoarset.description: use a direct solver at the coarsest level

mergeLevels.title: mergeLevels
mergeLevels.description: controls the speed at which coarsening or refinement is performed

nPreSweeps.title: nPreSweeps
nPreSweeps.description: number of sweeps as the algorithm is coarsening

preSweepsLevelMultiplier.title: preSweepsLevelMultiplier
preSweepsLevelMultiplier.description: multiplier for the the number of sweeps between each coarsening level

maxPreSweeps.title: maxPreSweeps
maxPreSweeps.description: maximum number of sweeps as the algorithm is coarsening

nPostSweeps.title: nPostSweeps
nPostSweeps.description: number of sweeps as the algorithm is refining

postSweepsLevelMultiplier.title: postSweepsLevelMultiplier
postSweepsLevelMultiplier.description: multiplier for the the number of sweeps between each refinement level

maxPostSweeps.title: maxPostSweeps
maxPostSweeps.description: maximum number of sweeps as the algorithm is refining

nFinestSweeps.title: nFinestSweeps
nFinestSweeps.description: number of sweeps at finest level

nCorrectorsPISO.title: nCorrectors
nCorrectorsPISO.description: sets the number of times the algorithm solves the pressure equation and momentum corrector in each step

nNonOrthogonalCorrectorsPISO.title: nNonOrthogonalCorrectors
nNonOrthogonalCorrectorsPISO.description: pecifies repeated solutions of the pressure equation, used to update the explicit non-orthogonal correction

momentumPredictorPISO.title: momentumPredictor
momentumPredictorPISO.description: switch that controls solving of the momentum predictor

nNonOrthogonalCorrectorsSIMPLE.title: nNonOrthogonalCorrectors
nNonOrthogonalCorrectorsSIMPLE.description: pecifies repeated solutions of the pressure equation, used to update the explicit non-orthogonal correction

momentumPredictorSIMPLE.title: momentumPredictor
momentumPredictorSIMPLE.description: switch that controls solving of the momentum predictor

nCorrectorsPIMPLE.title: nCorrectors
nCorrectorsPIMPLE.description: sets the number of times the algorithm solves the pressure equation and momentum corrector in each step

nNonOrthogonalCorrectorsPIMPLE.title: nNonOrthogonalCorrectors
nNonOrthogonalCorrectorsPIMPLE.description: pecifies repeated solutions of the pressure equation, used to update the explicit non-orthogonal correction

nOuterCorrectorsPIMPLE.title: nOuterCorrectors
nOuterCorrectorsPIMPLE.description: it enables looping over the entire system of equations within on time step, representing the total number of times the system is solved

momentumPredictorPIMPLE.title: momentumPredictor
momentumPredictorPIMPLE.description: switch that controls solving of the momentum predictor
